update bot_chat_request
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CHAT_SERVER_ID = #{chatServerId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SESSION_ID = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MAN_SESSION_ID = #{manSessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UTTERANCE = #{utterance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORMAT = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KNOWLEDGE_ID = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
READ = #{read,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TAG = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SELECTED = #{selected,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
QUESTION_METHOD = #{questionMethod},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
